full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RGYUD THAMS CAD KYI RGYAL PO DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RTZA BA'I RGYUD RGYUD PHYI MA DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @097B DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA THAMS CAD KYI SKU DANG GSUNG DANG THUGS KYI GSANG BA CHEN PO GSANG BA 'DUS PA LAS, GSANG BA THAMS CAD STON PA RDO RJE'I YE SHES BYIN GYIS RLOB PA ZHES BYA BA LE'U BCO BRGYAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO A'A TZARYA SHR'A DH'A KA RA WARMA DANG, ZHUNG CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG RIN CHEN BZANG POS BSGYUR CING BCOS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO 'JAM MGON BLA MA TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,AOm SVA STI, ,RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB KUN GYI MTHAR THUG PA, ,DPAL LDAN 'DUS PA RGYUD SDE'I YANG RTZE 'DI, ,BKRA SHIS GA-YAS SU 'KHYIL BA'I CHOS GRVA RU, ,CHOS TSUL MI ZAD 'BYIN PHYIR PAR DU SGRUBS, ,TSUL 'DIR BSOD NAMS SA BON CUNG ZAD TZAM, ,BTAB PA MTHA' DAG TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU, ,RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA'I, ,ZHABS PAD GUS PAS BSTEN NAS MNYES BYED CING, ,DE YI BKA' DRIN MCHOG LAS DAM CHOS KUN, ,'DZIN CING CHOS TSUL 'DI DANG MI 'BRAL BAR, ,MDO SNGAGS LAM BZANG MA LUS MTHAR PHYIN NAS, ,MTHAR THUG ZUNG @098A *, ,'JUG GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG ,DPAL LDAN 'DUS PA'I LAM GYIS 'GRO BA KUN, ,SGROL BAR BYED PA NUS PA THOGS MED CING,  ,BAR DU GCOD PA'I MING YANG MED PA DANG, ,CHOS 'DI PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS GYUR CIG , ,,)
translator_(орчуулагч): A'A TZARYA SHR'A DH'A KA RA WARMA , RIN CHEN BZANG PO,
